description:
cmd/go: test -i should not disable -c
        Fixes issue 3104.

messages.text:
This is the simplest fix, and more elegant fix needs to merge the logic for -i
and the normal test logic, and thus not handling -i as a special case.

*** Submitted as 20f0bc507d30 ***

cmd/go: test -i should not disable -c
        Fixes issue 3104.
